text:
The Prime Minister of the Hellenic Republic (, "Pro̱thypourgós ti̱s Elli̱nikí̱s Di̱mokratías"), known as the Prime Minister of Greece (, "Pro̱thypourgós ti̱s Elládas"), is the head of government of the Hellenic Republic and the leader of the Greek Cabinet.
The incumbent Prime Minister is Kyriakos Mitsotakis, who took office on 8 July 2019.
